 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַךְ‎</span> **verb** ==arrange or set in order== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; also ***roll*** dough, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרַךְ‎</span> ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערכת‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup> No. 132, 4</sup> ***valuation***, [[BDB#Bloch|Bloch]], but dubious; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III. ***contend*** in battle, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***battleground***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Job.32.14|Job 32:14]]; [[2Chr.13.3|2Chr 13:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְע‎</span> consecutive [[Lev.1.12|Lev 1:12]]; [[Lev.6.5|Lev 6:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַכְתִּי‎</span> [[Num.23.4|Num 23:4]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲרֹךְ‎</span> [[Exod.27.21|Exod 27:21]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְכָה‎</span> [[Job.33.5|Job 33:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִרְכוּ‎</span> [[Jer.46.3|Jer 46:3]]; [[Jer.50.14|Jer 50:14]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרֹךְ‎</span> [[Isa.21.5|Isa 21:5]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֹךָ‎</span> [[Judg.20.22|Judg 20:22]] +; ***Participle active*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרְכִים‎</span> [[Isa.65.11|Isa 65:11]], etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרוּךְ‎</span> [[Jer.6.23|Jer 6:23]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֱרוּךְ‎</span> [[Joel.2.5|Joel 2:5]], etc.; — not in [[BDB#D|D]]; — 

**1. a.** ***arrange in order***, seven altars [[Num.23.4|Num 23:4]], i.e. I have built seven altars ***in a row*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בנה‎</span> v[[Num.23.1|Num 23:1]]), flax-stalks [[Josh.2.6|Josh 2:6]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]); especially 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***set*** or ***lay in order***, as wood [[Gen.22.9|Gen 22:9]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.18.33|1Kgs 18:33]], compare Tophet [[Isa.30.33|Isa 30:33]]; [[Lev.1.7|Lev 1:7]] offerings [[Lev.1.8|Lev 1:8]]; [[Lev.1.12|Lev 1:12]]; [[Lev.6.5|Lev 6:5]] lamp(s) [[Exod.27.21|Exod 27:21]]; [[Lev.24.3|Lev 24:3]]; [[Lev.24.4|Lev 24:4]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), lamp (figurative of dynasty) [[Ps.132.17|Ps 132:17]] 'shew'-bread [[Exod.40.4|Exod 40:4]]; [[Exod.40.23|Exod 40:23]] (upon [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>] sacred <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁלְחָן‎</span> both with accusative of congnate meaning with verb), [[Lev.24.8|Lev 24:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** in common life (compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup> Sem i. 189 f., 2nd ed. 200 f.</sup>), ***arrange*** a table (i.e. dishes in order upon it), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁלְחָן‎</span> [[Isa.21.5|Isa 21:5]]; [[Prov.9.2|Prov 9:2]] (figurative of wisdom), [[Ezek.23.41|Ezek 23:41]] (of Jerusalem in figure); [[Ps.23.5|Ps 23:5]]; [[Ps.78.19|Ps 78:19]] (figurative; subject God); in idolatrous worship [[Isa.65.11|Isa 65:11]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** ***arrange*** a battle, i.e. draw up in battle order, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְחָמָה‎</span> [[Judg.20.22|Judg 20:22]]; [[1Sam.17.8|1Sam 17:8]] 2 Sam 10:8&gt; = [[1Chr.19.9|1Chr 19:9]]; [[1Chr.12.37|1Chr 12:37]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.36|1Chr 12:36]]), [[2Chr.14.9|2Chr 14:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרְכֵי מִלְחָמָה‎</span> [[1Chr.12.34|1Chr 12:34]]; [[1Chr.12.36|1Chr 12:36]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.33|1Chr 12:33]] v.[[1Chr.12.35|1Chr 12:35]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֱרוּךְ מ‎</span> [[Joel.2.5|Joel 2:5]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> ***with***, i.e. ***against*** [[Judg.20.20|Judg 20:20]]; [[Gen.14.8|Gen 14:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> [[2Chr.13.8|2Chr 13:8]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרַאת‎</span> [[1Sam.17.2|1Sam 17:2]]; [[1Chr.19.17|1Chr 19:17]] b; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲרָכָה לִקְרַאת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.17.21|1Sam 17:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמִּלְחָמָה עָרוּךְ כְּאִישׁ‎</span> [[Jer.6.23|Jer 6:23]]; [[Jer.50.42|Jer 50:42]] object omitted [[Judg.20.22|Judg 20:22]]; [[Judg.20.23|Judg 20:23]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרַאת‎</span> [[1Sam.4.2|1Sam 4:2]]; [[2Sam.10.9|2Sam 10:9]]; [[2Sam.10.10|2Sam 10:10]] = [[1Chr.19.10|1Chr 19:10]]; [[1Chr.19.11|1Chr 19:11]]; [[2Sam.10.17|2Sam 10:17]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> ***against*** [[Judg.20.30|Judg 20:30]]; [[Jer.50.14|Jer 50:14]]; [[1Chr.19.17|1Chr 19:17]] a, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> ***against*** [[Jer.50.9|Jer 50:9]]&gt;; — [[Job.6.4|Job 6:4]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַכְרוּנִי‎</span> [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** ***arrange*** weapons of army ***in order*** for battle [[Jer.46.3|Jer 46:3]]; [[1Chr.12.9|1Chr 12:9]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.8|1Chr 12:8]]). **feminine** ***arrange*** words (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלִּין‎</span>) [[Job.32.14|Job 32:14]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> ***against***), so (object omitted) [[Job.33.5|Job 33:5]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפָנַי‎</span>), [[Job.37.19|Job 37:19]]; [[Ps.5.4|Ps 5:4]] (probably; &gt; of arranging a sacrifice); compare ***recount*** things ***in order***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְרְכֶהָ לִי‎</span> [[Isa.44.7|Isa 44:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** ***state in order, set forth*** a legal case [[Job.13.18|Job 13:18]]; [[Job.23.4|Job 23:4]], so probably (object omitted) of God [[Ps.50.21|Ps 50:21]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעֵינֶיךָ‎</span>), and (passive of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרִית‎</span>) [[2Sam.23.5|2Sam 23:5]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲיַעֲרֹךְ שׁועך‎</span> [[Job.36.19|Job 36:19]] is difficult: [[BDB#Di|Di]] ***will he set thy cry*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁוְעֲךָ‎</span>) ***in order?*** [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲיֵעָרֵךְ שׁ‎</span> ***shall thy cry be set in order unto him?*** (sense good, although **Niph\`al** ==not found==); see al. in [[BDB#Di|Di]]. 

**2. a.** ***compare*** (as result of arranging in order): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֿוֺ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהדְּֿמוּת תַּע‎</span> [[Isa.40.18|Isa 40:18]] ***what likeness will ye compare to him?*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵין עֲרֹךְ אֵלֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.40.6|Ps 40:6]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** intransitive ***be comparable***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, [[Ps.89.7|Ps 89:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּמָה‎</span>), with suffix of thing compared [[Job.28.17|Job 28:17]]; [[Job.28.19|Job 28:19]]. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַךְ‎</span>] **verb denominative Hiph\`il** ==value== (for taxation), ==tax== (from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵרֶח‎</span> 

**2.**); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֶרִיח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.35|2Kgs 23:35]] in [[BDB#P|P]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֶע‎</span> consecutive, with accusative of person [[Lev.27.8|Lev 27:8]]; [[Lev.27.12|Lev 27:12]] with suffix v[[Lev.27.14|Lev 27:14]] ***Imperfect***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲרִיח‎</span> v[[Lev.27.14|Lev 27:14]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲרִיכֶנּוּ‎</span> v[[Lev.27.8|Lev 27:8]].
